about.details: Super Fine Knitters Ltd (SFKL) is a multi-divisional textile unit engage in the business of manufacturing knitted apparels for itself as well as for national and international brands and is a well-known supplier of knitted fabrics for large companies in India involved in manufacturing and exporting knitted apparels. The Company started as a fabric knitting unit and is now a well-known supplier of knitted fabrics and apparels to national and international brands. Its range of apparels covers all the age groups and segments such as for men’s wear, women’s wear, kids’ wear, boys & girls wear. SFKL uses variety of knitted fabrics such as 100% cotton to cotton lycra, 100% polyester, blended (cotton and polyester), mercerized to plain, washed to over dyed and other blended fabrics in the production of apparels. It sells all its products under the ‘Super Star’ brand.

contactDetails.full_address: Super Fine Knitters Ltd, 269, Industrial Area A

faqs.question: What is the Super Fine Knitters IPO?
faqs.answer:
Super Fine Knitters IPO is a SME IPO of 3400000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.08 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹12 per share. The minimum order quantity is .

The IPO opens on January 18, 2017, and closes on January 24, 2017.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Super Fine Knitters IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Super Fine Knitters IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Super Fine Knitters IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Super Fine Knitters IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Super Fine Knitters IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Super Fine Knitters IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Super Fine Knitters IPO opens on January 18, 2017 and closes on January 24, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Super Fine Knitters IPO?
faqs.answer: Super Fine Knitters IPO lot size and the minimum order quantity is not available at this time. Please check again later.

faqs.question: How to apply for Super Fine Knitters IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Super Fine Knitters IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
